alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton; Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:38PM EDT until July 13 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...HAMPTON...COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 338 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over McPhersonville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Yemassee, Hendersonville, Coosawhatchie, Gardens Corner, Sheldon, Early Branch, Gillisonville, McPhersonville, Grays and Pocotaligo. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 30 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
